exposurecontrolsystem: (P) Program AE (Program Shift is possible), (S) Shutter Speed Priority AE, (A) Aperture Priority AE, (M) Manual

label8: With the 46-megapixel, full-color Foveon X3 Direct Image Sensor, the DP cameras capture all primary RGB colors at each pixel location with three layers, which results in incredibly detailed images with a three-dimentional feel
power: Li-ion Battery Pack BP-41, Battery Charger BC-41
focuslock: Shutter release halfway-down position, AE lock button
label5: 19mm f/2.8 lens is the equivalent to a 28mm lens on a 35mm SLR camera
label6: The camera is compact and lightweight, and includes "F" Low Dispersion (FLD) glass to correct aberrations
label7: Super Multi Layer Coating to reduce flare and ghosting
